title: How to Be a Baddie!
itunes:title: How to Be a Baddie!
description:
In this episode, Kimberly Cobb shares 6 ways to transform yourself from a saddie to a baddie! She also talks about yoga, her mom's cancer, Justin Bieber's face paralysis, sexuality, Home Goods, and more!

 

Follow for weekly episodes of the "My Lips Aren't Sealed" podcast, where I discuss fashion, entertainment, travel tips, dating tips, pop culture, and more from my life! Thanks for listening!
